description: some descriptive words about the package
list of contributors to the package (not the data producer/publication author, but the poseidon package creator), each with name and email
email of one contributor (must be a valid email address)
version of the package (should be changed/incremented when the package is changed)
date of last modification of the poseidon package (should be updated when the package is changed)
file format definition, only allows PLINK right now
